rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with wide floor-to-ceiling windows to let in natural light, designed according to Vastu principles.
An open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light and ventilation. The layout is designed to ensure a harmonious flow as per Chettinad architectural style.
A modern kitchen integrated with the living area. Features ample window light and ventilation. Vastu guidelines considered for placement of sink and stove.
Adjacent to the living room and kitchen, designed with large windows to maintain brightness. Vastu alignment is considered for seating arrangements.
A master bedroom designed with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring privacy and natural light. Vastu principles considered for door and window placements.
Additional bedroom for family member, designed with ample natural light through large windows. Vastu guidelines are adhered to.
A functional bathroom located strategically as per Vastu to maintain privacy and natural ventilation.
A dedicated private gym with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and enhanced air quality. The layout is optimized for space and functionality.

openings.description: Large entry door with glass panels to welcome natural light into the entrance hall.
Balcony areas equipped with floor-to-ceiling windows for optimal natural light and ventilation.
